original_text: The Israelites stayed in Egypt, in the region called Goshen. They had their own land there. They gave birth to many children so that they became very many people.
korean_text: 이스라엘 족속이 애굽 고센 땅에 거주하며 거기서 생업을 얻어 생육하고 번성하였더라

sentences.original_text: They had their own land there
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그곳에 자신의 땅을 가지고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: They gave birth to many children
so that they became very many people
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 매우 많은 사람들이 되었습니다
